comment: I have gotten plenty of shots before and they have never lingered for weeks. I would personally pay attention to my heart beats, breathing rhythm, vision, and smell. If no changes, don't go to the dr, but if there is any negative changes, you better go to the Dr ASAP

comment: there are always going to be soreness and redness from the injection site for most shots. Some people heal in differently. Unless it is giving you issues I would not be worried about it. But I am not a doctor so If you have concerns I would see your doctor.
